languages.text: {n}Хлопок, удар в живот, резкий треск — и вас поглощает волна неизбывной, раздирающей нутро боли.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Хлопок, удар в живот, резкий треск — и вас поглощает волна неизбывной, раздирающей нутро боли.{/n}

languages.text: {n}With a pop and a sharp crackle, something hits you in the abdomen — and you are consumed by unbearable, gut-wrenching pain.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хлопок, удар в живот, резкий треск — и вас поглощает волна неизбывной, раздирающей нутро боли.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}With a pop and a sharp crackle, something hits you in the abdomen — and you are consumed by unbearable, gut-wrenching pain. The voice of the Master of Whispers sounds muffled, as if coming from under a mass of water:{/n} "But that is no longer relevant. I promised you a special destiny, {name}. It is time to fulfil it."

{n}With a pop and a sharp crackle, something hits you in the abdomen — and you are consumed by unbearable, gut-wrenching pain. The voice of the Master of Whispers sounds muffled, as if coming from under a mass of water:{/n} "But that is no longer relevant. I promised you a special destiny, {name}. It is time to fulfil it."
{n}With a pop and a sharp crackle, something hits you in the abdomen — and you are consumed by unbearable, gut-wrenching pain.{/n}
{n}With a pop and a sharp crackle, something hits you in the abdomen — and you are consumed by unbearable, gut-wrenching pain.{/n}
{n}With a pop and a sharp crackle, something hits you in the abdomen — and you are consumed by unbearable, gut-wrenching pain.{/n}
{n}With a pop and a sharp crackle, something hits you in the abdomen — and you are consumed by unbearable, gut-wrenching pain.{/n}

languages.text: {n}伴随着一声爆响与尖锐的噼啪声，你的腹部被什么东西击中了。撕心裂肺的剧痛吞噬了你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a pop and a sharp crackle, something hits you in the abdomen — and you are consumed by unbearable, gut-wrenching pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伴随着一声爆响与尖锐的噼啪声，你的腹部被什么东西击中了。撕心裂肺的剧痛吞噬了你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Con un ruido seco y un repentino restallido, algo te impacta en el abdomen... y te consume un dolor insufrible y desgarrador.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a pop and a sharp crackle, something hits you in the abdomen — and you are consumed by unbearable, gut-wrenching pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Con un ruido seco y un repentino restallido, algo te impacta en el abdomen... y te consume un dolor insufrible y desgarrador.{/n}

languages.text: {n}鋭いパチパチという音とともに、腹部に何かがぶつかり、あなたは耐え難い、腸が張り裂けるような痛みに襲われる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a pop and a sharp crackle, something hits you in the abdomen — and you are consumed by unbearable, gut-wrenching pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}鋭いパチパチという音とともに、腹部に何かがぶつかり、あなたは耐え難い、腸が張り裂けるような痛みに襲われる。{/n}
{n}鋭いパチパチという音とともに、腹部に何かがぶつかり、あなたは耐え難い、腸が張り裂けるような痛みに襲われる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un bruit sec accompagné d'un claquement aigu retentit tandis que quelque chose vous frappe à l'abdomen en vous infligeant une douleur intolérable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a pop and a sharp crackle, something hits you in the abdomen — and you are consumed by unbearable, gut-wrenching pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un bruit sec accompagné d'un claquement aigu retentit tandis que quelque chose vous frappe à l'abdomen en vous infligeant une douleur intolérable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mit einem Knall und einem scharfen Knistern trifft dich etwas in den Bauch – und ein unerträglicher Schmerz rast durch deine Eingeweide.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a pop and a sharp crackle, something hits you in the abdomen — and you are consumed by unbearable, gut-wrenching pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem Knall und einem scharfen Knistern trifft dich etwas in den Bauch – und ein unerträglicher Schmerz rast durch deine Eingeweide.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pat diye bir ses ve ani bir çatırtıyla karnına bir darbe alıyorsun ve kıvrım kıvrım kıvrandıran, dayanılmaz bir acıya yenik düşüyorsun.{/n}
